そんで: (そんで) - and; thereupon; because of that
そんでもって: (そんでもって) - and (so); because of which
そんな: (んな) - such (about the actions of the listener, or about ideas expressed or understood by the listener); like that; that sort of
そんなこんな: (そんなこんな) - (often as そんなこんなで) this and that; various things
そんなに: (そんなに) - so much; so; like that
そんなもの: (そういうもん) - that's the way it is; such is life
そんなもん: (そういうもん) - that's the way it is; such is life
そんな具合に: (そんなぐあいに) - in that manner
そんな訳で: (そんなわけで) - therefore; for that reason; such being the case
そんな風に: (そんなふうに) - in that manner; like that
そーっと: (そーっと) - softly; gently; quietly; secretly
そ求権: (そきゅうけん) - right of recourse; right for redemption
そ知らぬ顔: (そしらぬかお) - pretending not to recognize (recognise); feigned ignorance
ぞくぞく: (ぞくぞく) - shiver; feel chilly; shudder; thrill
ぞくっと: (ぞくっと) - tremblingly; having the chills (through fear, cold, anticipation, etc.)
ぞっこん: (ぞっこん) - madly in love/completely charmed by; from the heart/entirely/completely/seriously; the bottom of one's heart
ぞっと: (ゾッと) - shuddering; shivering; trembling; being horrified; being disgusted
ぞっとしない: (ぞっとしない) - not very appealing; pretty disgusting
ぞろぞろ: (ぞろぞろ) - in groups; in succession
ぞろり: (ぞろり) - all together in a line/all together in a lump; dressed sloppily/overdressed for the occasion
ぞろ目: (ぞろめ) - matching dice/doublets; bet on two horses in the same bracket
た: (た) - (だ after certain verb forms)  indicate past completed or action; indicates light imperative
たあい: (たあい) - (sometimes written as 他愛)  sanity/soundness of mind/prudence and discretion; drunkenness
たい: (たい) - (after the -masu stem of a verb) want to ... do something/would like to ...; (at sentence-end) indicates emphasis; (after a noun or the -masu stem of a verb; also ったい)  very ...
たいらぎ: (たいらぎ) - fan mussel (species of pen shell, Atrina pectinata)
たい焼き: (taiyaki) - panqueca em forma de peixe recheada com pasta de feijão
たかなみ型護衛艦: (たかなみがたごえいかん) - Takanami class destroyer
たがが外れる: (たががはずれる) - to become unrestrained and go to excess; to lose all restraint; to lose one's tension and become relaxed; to let go; to become disorderly; to be scattered; to lose one's self-control
たがる: (たがる) - (not used in the first person, combination of ~tai and ~garu)  wanting to ...; eager to ...; curious to ...
たき上げ: (たきあげ) - {Shinto} bonfire often in temple grounds, usu. of charms, talismans, New Year decorations, etc.; ritual burning of money, cedar sticks, or other objects as an offering
たき木: (たきぎ) - firewood/kindling/fuel; (usu. まき) piece(s) of firewood
たき火: (たきび) - open-air fire (e.g. for garden refuse)/bonfire; open fire (e.g. in a kitchen)
たくし上げる: (たくしあげる) - to roll up or pull up (sleeves, skirt, etc.)
たくる: (たくる) - to pull in; to take for oneself; to tuck up (one's sleeves)
たけり: (たけり) - ox or whale penis, used as a tonic or aphrodisiac
たけり狂う: (たけりくるう) - to rage; to rampage
たけり立つ: (たけりたつ) - (esp. 猛り立つ) to rage; (esp. 哮り立つ) to howl
たこつぼ型心筋症: (たこつぼがたしんきんしょう) - takotsubo cardiomyopathy
たこつぼ心筋症: (たこつぼしんきんしょう) - takotsubo cardiomyopathy
たこ焼き器: (たこやきき) - tako-yaki pan (cast iron with semi-spherical molds)
たこ焼き鍋: (たこやきなべ) - tako-yaki pan (cast iron with semi-spherical molds)
たこ部屋: (たこべや) - labor camp; labour camp; low-quality accommodation for laborers
たじろぐ: (たじろぐ) - to falter; to wince
たすき掛け: (たすきがけ) - tucking up the sleeves of a kimono with a tasuki
たたき上げ: (たたきあげ) - working one's way up; self-made person/veteran
たたき付ける: (たたきつける) - to strike; to throw; to slap something onto
たたき出す: (たたきだす) - to begin to strike; to kick out/to forcefully expel/to fire (someone); to hammer (pattern, etc.) into metal
たたき切る: (たたききる) - to mangle; to hack down; to chop down
たたき台: (たたきだい) - chopping block; springboard for discussion/draft proposal/tentative plan
たたき壊す: (たたきこわす) - to tear down; to shatter
たたき売り: (たたきうり) - sacrifice sale; bargain sale; discount sale
たたき起こす: (たたきおこす) - to wake up; to rouse out of bed
たたき込む: (たたきこむ) - to drive into; to throw into; to hit into
たたらを踏む: (たたらをふむ) - to stumble a step or two forward (when trying to stop); to pass one's destination and stumble a step or two forward; to totter
たたら星: (たたらぼし) - Chinese "Bond" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
ただいま帰りました: (ただいまかえりました) - Here I am; I'm home!
ただごと歌: (ただごとうた) - plain form (of waka)
ただしイケメンに限る: (ただしイケメンにかぎる) - (joc) Please note: limited to handsome people
ただじゃおかないぞ: (ただではおかないぞ) - You'll pay for this!; You'd better keep your mouth shut!
ただでは: (ただでは) - This isn't over; I will get my revenge
ただではおかないぞ: (ただではおかないぞ) - You'll pay for this!; You'd better keep your mouth shut!
ただより高いものはない: (ただよりたかいものはない) - (proverb) nothing costs as much as what is given to us; there's no such thing as a free lunch
ただ乗り: (ただのり) - free ride (e.g. on train)
ただ今: (tadaima) - atualmente, imediatamente, agora mesmo, agora pouco
ただ今帰りました: (ただいまかえりました) - Here I am; I'm home!
ただ働き: (ただばたらき) - working for free
ただ酒: (タダザケ) - free alcohol; free liquor; free drinks
ただ飯: (タダメシ) - free food; free meal
ただ飯はない: (ただめしはない) - there's no such thing as a free lunch
たちかぜ型護衛艦: (たちかぜがたごえいかん) - Tachikaze class destroyer
たちが悪い: (たちがわるい) - (ant: 質が良い) nasty; vicious; wicked; poor (quality)
たちの悪い: (たちのわるい) - (ant: 質の良い) nasty; poor (quality)
たちの良い: (たちのいい) - (ant: 質の悪い) good (quality)
たった: (たった) - only; merely; but; no more than
たった一つ: (たったひとつ) - single; solo; solitary; just one; only one
